slug: Tour Confidential: Is Rory McIlroy Really the New Tiger Woods?
body: Jeff Ritter and Cameron Morfit of Golf Magazine and Golf.com's Michael Walker join host Jessica Marksbury to discuss whether Rory McIlroy's recent run of dominance is comparable to that of Tiger Woods in his prime.
